headline: To Latinos in Los Angeles, Lakers Star Was a ‘Compa’
abstract: Spanish-speaking Angelenos saw Mr. Bryant, who spoke the language and embraced Latino culture, as one of their own.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — When Kobe Bryant reflected on his career in front of the cameras after playing his last professional basketball game in 2016, he did something rare in the N.B.A. — he switched to Spanish.
